name: Time Machine Hidden Objects - Time Travel Escape
name_original: Time Machine Hidden Objects - Time Travel Escape
description:
It's 2156, ten years after the apocalypse on Earth. Help Marvin, a robot from the other galaxy to travel in time threw centuries, take the evidence about the life on Earth and do the research in his space station. Get into the time traveling machine, find hidden objects that could be important for the investigation about humankind. Download Time Machine Hidden Objects - Time Travel Escape game and experience the most amazing adventure in your life. These extraterrestrials cannot figure out why the human kind was so stupid to destroy itself. Find the missing figures and parts of the puzzle and help them understand our history.

Time Machine Hidden Objects - Time Travel Escape features:

🔍 Adventure mystery game free localized into 15 languages!
🔍 More than 1000 hidden objects in time traveling scenes!
🔍 Multiple levels with mystery places full of hidden objects!
🔍 Fantastic 3D game design that will leave you speechless!
🔍 Find the hidden object from the card below & click on it!
🔍 Click on the magnifying glass button to use help you find items!
🔍 For mobile phones only! - Zoom in the picture to find the objects!
🔍 Move the picture when it is zoomed to find the hidden object!
🔍 Zoom out at any moment you like to see the whole scene!


Additional time travel escape adventure hidden object game features:

🔍 Picture search for finding hidden objects quickly and easily!
🔍 Silhouette hidden object – a challenging level for finding items!
🔍 Word scramble game level – a hard level to find hidden figures!
🔍 Flashlight or a night mode level – use the light to seek for items!
🔍 Memory game with cards - find matching cards!
🔍 Find the Difference – a mini-game to spot the difference between pics!
🔍 Time limit game - bonus level to train your brain and concentration!
🔍 Tile puzzle game – put the puzzle pieces together to make a picture!


Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Webelinx.Hidden.Object.Games/
Follow us on VK: https://vk.com/igripoiskpredmetov

Time Machine Hidden Objects - Time Travel Escape game for adults is the best search and find missing items game with multiple levels. Each level is one epoch that hides many secrets. Try not to get into the time trap. You cannot escape from one epoch with your time travel machine before you get all the hidden objects you need to pass the level. With time machine future and past are mixing and make you very confused. But don't let that distract you from your mission. Find hidden objects in pictures and find the truth about the apocalypse. Maybe these aliens and robots can help you make living on Earth possible again. So prepare for the ride, this time travel simulator is perfect for you.


Be a time traveler with the best hidden object game full version 2019 free download!

If you like adventure games with missing objects in pictures, and you love apocalypse games, this seek and find game for adults will be perfect for you. The time machine will take you through centuries, even in the period of the dinosaurs to find out the cause of their extinction. Then go to the period of ancient Egypt and Rome, find lost cities, then walk through the middle ages and Wild West. Go to the Far East, show the aliens their way of life. If you are a fan of war games, you can be very satisfied with this mystery hidden object adventure game. Download Time Machine Hidden Objects - Time Travel Escape game and be sure that you will have the fun every second while playing this addictive game.

Back to the future time machine! One of the best time travel escape games 2019!

Time traveling theory was always interesting. People didn't know how to make a time machine, and every attempt was in vain. But the living beings from another galaxy are more intelligent, and years after the apocalypse they are ready to help and bring back life to Earth. Time Machine Hidden Objects - Time Travel Escape game for women, men, boys, and girls is a perfect addictive game. Try it for free and enjoy!
